QuestData.Title: Suspiciously Quiet
QuestData.Description:
Can you spare a minute, $p? I haven't heard from my two apprentices, Scrumpy and Tucky, in some time.
This is concerning.
I sent them to fetch us supplies for the inn. They couldn't have strayed too far...
Please find them, but I warn you... They're... quite the handful.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Noriko's apprentices in Camp Antonidas.
QuestData.RewardText:
<The young vulpera nervously puts his hands behind his back.>
Do we know you? Noriko said not to talk to strangers...
